about_the_game:
Survive and endure. Never before has the goal of Star Dynasties been more clear than within the new DLC, Bloodlines.

Explore the enriched and expanded gameplay with family-driven events, features, and bonuses. Develop your dynasty as you see fit and secure a legacy to outlast generations.

Design Your Starting Family

With the new Family Designer feature, you have much more control over your initial family. Customise each character’s age and appearance, as well as your family’s size. Do you want to begin with a troop of children, or none at all? You can even start from an empty house, for an extra challenge.

Mould Your Children to Your Needs

With new events surrounding your child’s upbringing, you can influence how they grow and develop. Determine their personalities and the skills they learn. Or use them as political pawns to build trust with vassals and nearby rulers.

Control Who Inherits

New succession models have been added, giving players more options and control over who will rise to power within the dynasty. Wield the ability to disinherit family members and appoint new heirs wisely, to keep everyone in line. And when you’re tired of ruling, abdicate and let your heirs handle the mess.

Unlock and Upgrade Your Dynasty

As more of your kin rise to power, you will be able to unlock points that can be spent on upgrades to benefit generations to come. Garner a bloodthirsty reputation that intimidates other rulers, win the adoration of the common folk, or become the galaxy’s foremost diplomats. Choose your legacy!

Family Drama

Experience new family-driven events, from childhood rivalries to squabbles over inheritance. In addition, new expedition events will provide the chance to attain historically significant bonuses to your dynasty.

legal_notice: Star Dynasties © 2017-2021 Pawley Games. Developed by Pawley Games. Licensed exclusively worldwide to and published by Iceberg Interactive B.V. All brands, product names, and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. All rights reserved. Made in the UK.
name: Star Dynasties: Bloodlines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 660ti (resolution 1366x768 or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Star Dynasties is not compatible with PCs running Citrix Workspace Hub
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 3.4Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960 (resolution 1366x768 or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Star Dynasties is not compatible with PCs running Citrix Workspace Hub

dejus.descriptors:
